title: Ion Channels
description: We will examine the basic biophysical properties, structure-function relationships, physiological regulation, pathology and pharmacological manipulation of ion channels with heavy reliance on recent literature.
restrictions: __HEADER_0__Must be enrolled in one of the following Campuses:
prerequisites: BIOL 3450 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or BIOS 3450 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or APPH 3755 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or BIOL 3755 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or BIOS 3755 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or BMED 3100 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or NEUR 3100 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D
